description: API Project: URL Shortener Microservice for freeCodeCamp User Stories I can POST a URL to [project_url]/api/shorturl/new and I will receive a shortened URL in the JSON response. Example : {"original_url":"www.google.com","short_url":1} If I pass an invalid URL that doesn't follow the valid http(s)://www.example.com(/more/routes) format, the JSON response will contain an error like {"error":"invalid URL"}. HINT: to be sure that the submitted url points to a valid site you can use the function dns.lookup(host, cb) from the dns core module. When I visit the shortened URL, it will redirect me to my original link. Creation Example: POST [project_url]/api/shorturl/new - body (urlencoded) : url=https://www.google.com
